summary:
Optimism is distributing 1,000,000 OP to creators! - Submit your art before the December 13th deadline and celebrate onchain art with us!

 OP Mainnet is a low-cost and lightning-fast Ethereum L2 blockchain powered by Optimism. - OP Mainnet is a fast, stable, and scalable L2 blockchain built by Ethereum developers, for Ethereum developers.

 OP Mainnet goes Superchain - The Superchain project seeks to maximize interoperability and composability between different chains using the OP Stack, and integrate siloed L2s into a single, cohesive layer.

 OP Mainnet is more than just a blockchain. It's an experiment in sustainable ecosystem funding fueled by protocol revenue. - Retroactive Public Goods Funding is simple: you build for the public good, you're eligible to receive a grant.
